Take Away Message
Take Away Message

CPC is working to improve the product suite in two important ways:
CPC is working to improve the product suite in two
important ways:

- Improve the skill of official outlooks, and
- Improve the skill of official outlooks, and

- Expand / improve the product mix and presentation.
- Expand / improve the product mix and presentation.

We are asking help from the CPAS community in the second area, especially based on your interactions with users.
We are asking help from the CPAS community in the
second area, especially based on your interactions with
users.

CPC Mission
CPC Mission

We deliver climate prediction, monitoring, and assessment products for timescales from weeks to years to the Nation and the global community for the protection of life and property and the enhancement of the economy.
We deliver climate prediction, monitoring, and assessment
products for timescales from weeks to years to the Nation and the
global community for the protection of life and property and the
enhancement of the economy.
